tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN heart)) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBN turned) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN sugar) (NN cane))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [turned/VBN nsubjpass>[heart/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$] auxpass>is/VBZ nmod:to>[cane/NN case>to/TO compound>sugar/NN] punct>!/.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (CC &)) (VP (VBP am) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ lucky) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB have) (NP (JJ such) (ADJP (RB divinely) (JJ loving)) (NNS friends))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [lucky/JJ nsubj>&/CC cop>am/VBP advmod>so/RB xcomp>[have/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[friends/NNS amod>such/JJ amod>[loving/JJ advmod>divinely/RB]]] punct>./.]
